---
title: 'Overview'
description: "Command-line tools for building, running, and serving expressions"
---

The Xorq CLI builds expressions from Python scripts, runs built artifacts, and serves them over Arrow Flight. **Build path** means an alias, catalog entry ID, build ID, or path to a build directory.
